A successful shot is worth two points, or three points if it is taken from beyond the three-point arc 6.75 meters (22 ft 2 in) from the basket in international games and 23 feet 9 inches (7.24 m) in NBA games.

Games are played in four quarters of 10 (FIBA) or 12 minutes (NBA).
